name: Human Intervention (GGJ2020)
description:
A game for the 2020 Global Game Jam

Play as a foolish human who thinks they can single handedly restore an island messed up from human induced climate change.

As with all GameJam Games, this is unfinished.
Extra features planned:

Fire propagation (trying to combine two rocks makes fire)
A day//night cycle and the island changes at dusk and dawn (small animals eat grass or die if there's no grass, predator animals eat smaller animals or the player if there's no animals)
More failure states 
A victory state for having seen each possible item and learned your lesson
